entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
